price: Dájúdájú àwọn ẹrúsìn Mi, kò sí agbára kan fún ọ lórí wọn. Olúwa rẹ sì tó ní Olùṣọ́.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٞۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun wakafā birabbika wakīlan
